member.name: D3D_INTERPOLATION_MODE
member.summary: Specifies interpolation mode, which affects how values are calculated during rasterization.

member.name: D3D_INTERPOLATION_MODE.D3D_INTERPOLATION_LINEAR_CENTROID
member.summary: Interpolate linearly between register values but centroid clamped when multisampling.

member.name: D3D_INTERPOLATION_MODE.D3D_INTERPOLATION_LINEAR_NOPERSPECTIVE
member.summary: Interpolate linearly between register values but with no perspective correction.

member.name: D3D_INTERPOLATION_MODE.D3D_INTERPOLATION_LINEAR_NOPERSPECTIVE_CENTROID
member.summary: Interpolate linearly between register values but with no perspective correction and centroid clamped when multisampling.

member.name: D3D_INTERPOLATION_MODE.D3D_INTERPOLATION_LINEAR_SAMPLE
member.summary: Interpolate linearly between register values but sample clamped when multisampling.

member.name: D3D_INTERPOLATION_MODE.D3D_INTERPOLATION_LINEAR_NOPERSPECTIVE_SAMPLE
member.summary: Interpolate linearly between register values but with no perspective correction and sample clamped when multisampling.
